OMEGA

Death is not the end. It's the beginning of your legend.

EMBRACE THE DARKNESS

In the grim darkness of the Omega Realm, there is only the fight to survive.

BULLET HELL COMBAT

Weave through cascading patterns of eldritch projectiles. Split-second reflexes separate the living from the dead. Master the dance of death or become another forgotten soul in the void.

Gameplay Video Coming Soon

PERMADEATH STAKES

Hardcore mode means permanent death. Your legend lives on the leaderboardâ€”your character does not. Every decision carries weight. Every battle could be your last. There are no safety nets in the Omega Realm.

Gameplay Video Coming Soon

CUTTHROAT COMPETITION

Races and tournaments with real consequences. Will you cooperate with others, or put a knife in their back when they least expect it? Trust is a currency that can buy victoryâ€”or seal your doom.

Gameplay Video Coming Soon

FAST PROGRESSION, DEEP ENDGAME

Race to level cap. Then the real game begins: hunting rare gear, consuming permanent stat potions, and climbing the ladder. The strongest warriors carry scars from a hundred battlesâ€”those who don't carry graves.

Gameplay Video Coming Soon

YOUR DEATH HAS BEEN WRITTEN

Prove it wrong.

Join thousands of survivors in the battle for existence. The old gods are hungry. Feed them your enemiesâ€”or become the feast.
